description.en: Match the correct items with their pairs from two lists.
description.nl: Koppel de juiste items aan hun tegenhangers uit twee lijsten.

generation.instructions: Generate settings that look like this: {"pairs": ["Apple = Red", "Banana = Yellow", "Grapes = Purple"], "correctAnswer": ["Apple = Red", "Banana = Yellow", "Grapes = Purple"]}. `pairs` is an array of strings, where each string represents a correct match in the format 'left = right'. Make sure these exactly match the pairs specified, and always contains exactly ` = `. The field `correctAnswer` should contain exactly the same value as `pairs`. Generate between 2 and 5 pairs. Do not include any other fields.

settings.name: Pairs
settings.description: Array containing pairs, where each pair is a string that contains ` = `. The text left of the ` = ` in each pair will be shown in the left column, and the rest in the right column. Example: `["Apple = Red", "Banana = Yellow"]`.

The layout to use for displaying the matching question. `vertical` displays the items in two vertical columns, while `horizontal` displays them in two horizontal rows. Don't use horizontal if there are more than 3 items.
Whether to show the options in a random order to the student.

help-vertical.en: Add the correct combinations. The student will see the left column items, and must match them with the right column items.
help-vertical.nl: Voeg de juiste combinaties toe. De leerling ziet de items in de linker kolom en moet ze koppelen aan de items in de rechter kolom.

help-horizontal.en: Add the correct combinations. The student will see the top row items, and must match them with the bottom row items.
help-horizontal.nl: Voeg de juiste combinaties toe. De leerling ziet de items in de bovenste rij en moet ze koppelen aan de items in de onderste rij.

drag-options.en: Drag these items to the correct matches.
drag-options.nl: Sleep deze items naar de juiste combinaties.
